attributes.action: Promote introduction of  Flexible "Choose What Days you Travel" Season Tickets for Rail Passengers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a "part-time" regular commuter from the midlands to London - it is currently prohibitively expensive to travel by train. (even with the 20% increase on fuel in the last year)

To promote further use of public transport - it would be useful for rail industry to offer season tickets for part-time travellers.

eg. offer 1-5 days a week for 1 month/year etc. 
Choosing to travelling for example on Mon, Tue and Wed

A season ticket currently will cost a considerable amount a year up front. If I travel twice a week, have a car for 5 years, pay regular maintenance costs and fuel - it is still considerably cheaper...

This option would certainly make me think twice about driving...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
